greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: column k has g.f. = Sum_{k>0} x^k/(1-x^(2*k+1)).
comment: Number triangle related to divisors of 2n+1. Row n has a 1 in column k iff 2*k+1 divides 2*n+1. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 23 2020
xref: Rows sums are A099774. Rows as decimals give A114001.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Nov 12 2005
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 23 2020
